title: BONK Token Surges 75% as LetsBonk Overtakes Pumpfun in Trading Volume
summary: BONK token has gained 75% in 14 days, driven by its LetsBonk launchpad surpassing Pumpfun with $411M in 24hr volume. The ecosystem's strength is evident in BONKbot generating $4.35M monthly fees and successful meme launches like USELESS (14x) and IKUN (10x).

title: BONK Hackathon Awards $200K in Prizes to DeFi Innovators
summary: BONK's recent hackathon concluded with $140K awarded to first place winner BESTCOIN, $50K to second place, and $10K to third place. This $200K total prize pool demonstrates BONK's commitment to ecosystem development.

title: Pumpfun Token Sale Set for July 12 at $0.04 USDT
summary: Pumpfun will launch its token sale on exchanges July 12, offering 150 billion PUMP tokens at $0.04 USDT per token. This represents a $6 billion fully diluted valuation for the popular meme coin launchpad.

title: Paradigm Leads $11.5M Series A for Monad DEX Developer Kuru Labs
summary: Kuru Labs secured $11.5M in Series A funding led by Paradigm to build a DEX on Monad using a hybrid CLOB-AMM model. This innovative approach combines central limit order books with automated market makers for enhanced liquidity and native limit orders.

title: Metaplanet Purchases 2,205 BTC for $238.7M, Becomes 5th Largest Corporate Holder
summary: Japanese investment firm Metaplanet added 2,205 BTC at an average price of $108,237, spending $238.7M to bring total holdings to 15,555 BTC. This positions Metaplanet as the 5th largest publicly listed corporate Bitcoin holder globally.

title: Elon Musk's American Party to Support Bitcoin, Calls Fiat 'Hopeless'
summary: Elon Musk announced his new American Party will support Bitcoin, stating 'fiat is hopeless' in a potential political endorsement of cryptocurrency. This marks a significant political development for crypto adoption in the United States.
